data.title: Afrika Bambaataa â€” Hip Hop Electronic
data.meta_description: Bambaataa's nearly 40 years of music includes 12 albums, and music that helped form a positive public fellowship and also provided him and others a mean to speak out on politics and social matters.
data.text:
Be part of the HipHopElectronic.com DJ and Producer Community!

Where electronic music is a religion with scriptures inscribed on vinyl and a community for building your brand!

Hip Hop Electronic is solely a fan-supported website so thank you! Cheers for helping keep annoying ads off of our website and allowing browsing to be done anonymously without invasive data tracking while still providing us a way to bring you the goods of the eclectic electric yesteryears.

100% of your donation goes directly to musicians!

We help support now-a-day musicians by paying electronic music producers and DJs to write and catalog content for this site.
